subject: Your winning notification
body:
luckysurf International Lotteries 
Online Promotions Department
London, United Kingdom.

 
 
Ref: EGS/2251256003/02
Batch: 14/0017/1PD
 
Dear Sir/Madam,

We are pleased to inform you of the result of the National Lottery Free Award Winner's International programs held on 20st June, 2007. We are really sorry for the late notification, this is due to the mix up in the names and batch numbers of winners as such we were unable to contact you with this notification until now.
 
National Lottery Free Award draws was conducted as part of our international promotions program, you have been selected from an exclusive list of 25,000,000 e-mail addresses of individual and corporate bodies picked by an advanced automated random computer ballot search from the internet 'NO TICKETS OR DRAFTS WERE SOLD'.
 
Your email address attached to Security File Number: 56475600545 188 with Serial number 5368/02 drew the Lucky Numbers -6-16-18-29-30-35- and bonus ball 48, has been selected as one of the lucky winning email-address, therefore you have been approved of a lump sum payout of One million Pounds (£1,000,000.00) Pounds.
 
To file claim for your winning contact your claims agent:
 
Contact Person: Mr Fred Martin,
 
Tel: +44-704-572-1319  
Fax: +44 709 288 2303
Email: luckysurf.info@j-mail.info


*We are very much aware of the Fraudulent Lottery Notification circulating the Internet, this is why we have made our activities on line verifiable so be carefull who you contact and please report any other Notification that claim to to be from us to : scamnotice@europe.com.


Sincerely Yours,
Mrs. Litza Martinez,
Executive (International luckysurf).
